postText: To keep your code clean, you can delete old branches after you have merged them by using git branch -d branchname.
To avoid uploading or merging code that doens't work or is no longer desired, you can create your own branches using the command git checkout - b branchname.

postTitle: Declare variables in your CSS files to make changes easier
postText: You can declare variables in your stylesheets to make changes easier later by using the :root and --variablename:value key:value combination. Once declared, you can invoke in other styles using var(--variablename).

postTitle: Help with program debugging with Type Of
postText: You can determine the data type of a variable by using the typeof(variablename) method.
